resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="jwt8_users",
    refresh=True,
    roles=[
        "user"
    ],
    rules={
        "all": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "realm.name": "jwt8"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "username": "principalname1"
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    enabled=True,
)
print(resp)
